name: Maximum Celarity
description:
Was working on a game meant to evoke Terminal Velocity, specifically the network head to head dogfights of it. 

There was definitely something to start here, but it's not coming together as a 'game', so I'm putting it here for feedback and thoughts so it doesn't just sit in obscurity.  

You can host a game to play alone, no enemies and practice the flight, or share your ip to play head to head with a friend.

Fire afterburners to launch, works with keyboard or flight stick (we used a Thrustmaster for testing).  Have not tried with a game pad.

Gameplay Instructions for keyboard:

To launch press afterburner.

[Left Shift] Afterburner.

[Keypad 2,4,6,8] pitch and roll.

[Keypad 7,9] yaw.

[space bar] fire.

[keypad enter] missiles

[A,Z] raise lower thrust.

[.] Change Satellite orientation to world or local.

[Page Up, Page Down] Change Satellite Zoom

[ESDF] Micro pitch and yaw (aiming)
